section.title: Summary of changes
section.para: This section lists the changes of The &product; Administrator Guide.

Simple templates can be defined without braces. Templates can also reference other templates. For details, see .
Custom template functions can be defined in the &abbrev; configuration. For details, see .
CSV-parsers can use strings as delimiters. For details, see .
IPv6 addresses can be filtered using a new filter. For details, see .
The loggen utility can send messages indefinitely using the --permanent option.
The extract-solaris-msgid() parser has beed added to .

Version 3.7 and newer automatically includes the plugin.conf files from the <directory-where-syslog-ng-is-installed>/scl/*/ directories, making it easier to use and distribute configuration blocks.
The --enable-all-modules compiler option has beed added to .

The tcp(), tcp6(), udp(), udp6() source and destination drivers have been deprecated, as all of their functionality can be achieved with the network() driver. For help on migrating to the network() driver, see and .
The beginning of has been extended with basic troubleshooting information.
The description of the chain-hostnames() global option has been clarified and extended. For details, see .
